author: Nikunj C. Oza and Stuart J. Russell
title: Online Bagging and Boosting
venue: Computer Science Division University of California
window: ITI online algorithm [14]; batch and online Naive Bayes algorithms are essentially identical. To illustrate the convergence of batch and online learning, we experimented with the Car Evaluation dataset from the UCI Machine Learning Repository [2]. The dataset has 1728 examples, of which we retained 346 (20%) as a test set and used 200, 400, 600, 800, 1000, 1200, and all the remaining 1382 examples
